name: Singapore Airshow (Public Days)
notes: Changi Exhibition Centre. Flying displays, static aircraft. Expect crowds. Book tickets in advance.

name: Singapore Airshow (Public Days)
notes: Day 2. Less crowded if going Sunday morning.

name: Chinese New Year Eve
notes: Family reunions, Chinatown decorations, River Hongbao preparations

name: Chinese New Year Day 1 (Year of the Horse)
notes: Public holiday. Most attractions closed or crowded. Family time.

name: Chingay Parade
notes: F1 Pit Building. Street parade, floats, performances. Free but book seats.
